text: En atiyarkale! (Unkalil) evarum varampu miri tamakkuttame tinkilaittuk konta potilum, allahvutaiya rahmattil avar nampikkaiyilakka ventam - niccayamaka allah pavankal yavaiyum mannippan - niccayamaka avan mikka mannippavan; mikkak karunaiyutaiyavan" (enru nan kuriyatai napiye!) Nir kuruviraka
